text:
I´m trying to redirect to a URL that includes "ñ" using "response.sendRedirect", but it parses wrongly this kind of character; I´ve tried it using "URLEncoder" and differents encondings (UTF-8,UTF-16,etc).

What´s the correct way to do this redirect?

Thanks.
